alert.note: Alert for Clay; Coles; Cumberland; Effingham; Jasper; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 5:31PM CDT until July 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Coles County in east central Illinois... Northwestern Jasper County in southeastern Illinois... Southeastern Shelby County in central Illinois... Western Cumberland County in east central Illinois... North central Clay County in south central Illinois... Eastern Effingham County in south central Illinois... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Montrose, or near Toledo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public reported downed trees and power poles in Effingham. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Coles, northwestern Jasper, southeastern Shelby, western Cumberland, north central Clay and eastern Effingham Counties, including the following locations... Trowbridge, Woodbury, Gila, Effingham County Airport, Elliotstown, Sigel, Latona and Heartville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 158 and 180. Interstate 70 between mile markers 91 and 110. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Coles; Cumberland; Effingham; Jasper; Shelby
